channel.title: Running Error
channel.description:
Hey, I'm trying to use a new 614 source, and i am getting an error when i try to run it; this error is:
[17:51:28] [Server] Starting loading Cache... java.lang.NullPointerException at dragonkk.rs2rsps.rscache.CacheManager.load(CacheManager.java:18) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.rscache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:16) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.Server.<init>(Server.java:35) at dragonkk.rs2rsps.Server.main(Server.java:57)
if any additional info is needed, just post what. (-:
Reagrds, Linear.

item.title: Running Error
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

i dont have the folder anymore, but just look around…post a pic of the main folder, i might remember more

item.title: Running Error

item.description:
@ii_Linear wrote:

I have already downloaded the 614 cache into m c drive.

Where would the folder and code line be to check?

item.title: Running Error
item.dc:creator: @Butchd12 Butchd12
item.description:
@Butchd12 wrote:

lol, i had the same error a long time ago but i managed to fix it.

First you need to make sure in the source, its looks for your 614 cache in your c:/cache614 ( change the “cache614” to whatever your cache is called) then try running it again, tell me what happends

Read full topic
